name: 辜炳達
objective: 本課程旨在引導學生閱讀英美短篇故事，探討其敘事技巧、情節、人物、觀點和語言等，如何在故事中建構意義，並著重故事所傳達的文化意涵。
schedule:
W1 Course Intro
W2 The Sisters
W3 An Encounter
W4 Araby
W5 Eveline
W6 After the Race
W7 Two Gallants
W8 The Boarding House
W9 Midterm
W10 A Little Cloud
W11 Counterparts
W12 Clay
W13 A Painful Case
W14 Ivy Day in the Committee Room
W15 A Mother
W16 Grace
W17-18 The Dead
scorePolicy:
In-class performance 30%
Oral presentation 30%
Term paper 40%
